review: Love it for my son who is two
author: _Meg

review: Positive: Has a dedicated Sling TV app and Amazon services integration is flawless.Negative: Cannot login to Twitch app(Runs at maximum of 720p), has zero presence of Google services except third party apps.Overall: Very clean and sleek UI design but can make it difficult to search for specifics.
author: Steven Robinson

review: Love it. Bought a second one. Easy to use and setup. Bought my parents one for their bedroom too. Well worth $39.
author: Courtenay

review: Awesome!  I also have a chromecast, but the fire stick is so much better.
author: Sheri Holsopple

review: It's taking binge watching to a new level!
